pullRequest.title: [RW:4719][RISK=NO] Create workspace: indicate what will be made public
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add Publicly Displayed icon to all the questions except 3, 4 and 6


Highlight the description text for Research Purpose


Remove text "Not publicly displayed" from question 3 and 4


While reviewing changes to workspace Edit page Lou suggested changes for publicly displayed icon (font size and weight)






PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 This PR includes appropriate unit tests
 I have run and tested this change locally
 Approval from Lou
 Approval from Karthik

commit.message: Create workspace: indicate what will be made public

nodes.bodyText: Thank you for this! I'll remove future instances of All of Us as I run in to them.
nitpick: can you do this by saying indent={true} publiclyDisplayed={true} instead ?
Can we use this above, in the AouTitle element?

Also, weird nit: If we use AouTitle above, we should probably have this one be Aou? Just for consistency of capitalization? (As much as I don't like it because it is an acronym and we italicize it as AoU in text in english)
There's a missing space here. (look at the screenshot. I think the space after the is missing.)
